articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: Detroit Lions receiver Marvin Jones and wife mourning loss of son Marlo, 6 months old
articles.description: Tragedy struck the home of Detroit Lions wide receiver Marvin Jones and his wife on Friday when their 6-month-old son Marlo died suddenly.
articles.content:
Tragedy struck the home of Detroit Lions wide receiver Marvin Jones and his wife on Friday when their 6-month-old son Marlo died suddenly.
The cause of the child’s death wasn’t immediately clear.
Both Jones and the NFL's Lions posted messages on social medi… [+1441 chars]

articles.author: Brie Stimson
articles.title: LSU's Joe Burrow learned of Carley McCord's plane crash during live TV interview
articles.description: Louisiana State University quarterback Joe Burrow was caught off-guard by a post-game reporter who asked him after LSU's Peach Bowl victory about the death of Carley McCord, a popular Louisiana sports reporter and daughter-in-law of LSU offensive coordinator …
articles.content: Louisiana State University quarterback Joe Burrow was caught off-guard by a post-game reporter who asked him after LSU's Peach Bowl victory about the death of Carley McCord, a popular Louisiana sports reporter and daughter-in-law of LSU offensive coordinator … [+1121 chars]

articles.author: Ralph D. Russo
articles.title: Clemson tops Ohio State 29-23, will face LSU for national championship
articles.description: Trevor Lawrence connected with Travis Etienne on a 34-yard touchdown with 1:49 left in the fourth quarter and No. 3 Clemson beat No. 2 Ohio State 29-23 Saturday night at the Fiesta Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff championship game.
articles.content: GLENDALE, Ariz. — Trevor Lawrence connected with Travis Etienne on a 34-yard touchdown with 1:49 left in the fourth quarter and No. 3 Clemson beat No. 2 Ohio State 29-23 Saturday night at the Fiesta Bowl to advance to the College Football Playoff championship… [+1219 chars]
